docs.title: Welcome to the hamiumʷⁱᵏⁱ
docs.text: This is the wiki for the hamium server, containing information about players, structures and factions, during past and current seasons.

docs.title: Quick links
docs.text:
• Famous players - A list of famous players and information about them.
  • Major structures - A list of major/large structures and information about them
  • Factions - A list of current/disbanded factions and information about them
  • Season 1 - Information about season 1 structures, factions, etc.
  • Season 2 - Information about season 2 structures, factions, etc.
  • Season 3 - Information about season 3 structures, factions, etc.
  • Season 4 (current) - Information about the current season's structures, factions, etc.

docs.title: List of staff
docs.text: Below is a list of every staff member of the server.

docs.title: Owners
docs.text:
• leunium - One of the two owners of the server, manages the main server, and developed the hammer plugin.
  • hamhimstudio - One of the two owners of the server, hosted the server in S1, and manages the proxy as well as the discord server.

docs.title: Head admins
docs.text:
• claniverse - The main head admin, manages the technical side of the server occasionally and helps develop the hammer plugin.
  • kaeud. - The "secondary" head admin, manages the community side of the server and helps with hosting events.

docs.title: Admins
docs.text:
• .reguleo - 5th person to join hamium, and one of the first staff member. Moderates the server.
  • crystalclear8285 (slimsiomai) - The 3rd person to join hamium. Also an egg. Moderates the server.
  • captainmcchicken (captain) - Manages team tags, and helps with the technical side of the server.

docs.title: Helpers

  • chip8709 (giangvu) - Builder for hamiumᵐᵐᵒ.
  • mireu - Builder for hamium.
  • ajipotato- idk

docs.title: Retired/demoted staff
docs.text: • hydra - The 4th person to join hamium, demoted at 7th march 2024.
